title: Signs Allah has Accepted Your Repentance | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: um his third question uh is what are the signs of allah accepting the repentance there isn't anything prescribed in the quran most scholars say that the signs that allah accepted your repentance is that you're improving and you are progressing day by day so you don't go back to sin rather you do a lot of good deeds you recite the quran more you're becoming more practicing this is a sign that allah has accepted your repentance
